title: The.Intern.2015.HDCAM-HQMIC.AC3.HQ.Hive-CM8
description:
http://extraimago.com/image/db0
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2361509/


70-year-old widower Ben Whittaker has discovered that retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes a senior intern at an online fashion site, founded and run by Jules Ostin.

Director: Nancy Meyers
Writer: Nancy Meyers
Stars: Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway, Rene Russo
Genres: Comedy
Country: USA
Language: English


The.Intern.2015.HDCAM-HQMIC.AC3.HQ.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time 

Sources:

Video: Ukrainian HDCAM 1 and 2
Audio: HQMic Audio from a friend xoxo
thx guys for helping out

Notes:

got 2 great early hdcams,both steady without shaking, great quality for that funny movie, dont miss it
one was better the first hour the other the second hour, so best way was to combine them to get a complete movie.
a russian version is already out, but misses 22mins, so this one is the only complete one now.
for security reasons the warner logo upfront and the endcredits were already chopped off, hence runtime shorter, but nothing from the movie is missing

Encode:

both cams were already bright enough, fixed brightness-contrast relation, added sharpness and denoise
The 2nd cam had a different ar and resolution so i had to find a common ground to combine them without hurting the other video.
so the last 40mins are still widescreen now just not that wide, i could have zoomed in to fit perfectly but than i had to crop 60 more lines to do so, rather left it as it is.
this will do just fine, added pics from first and 2nd cam for preview

for the Audio i waited for the better hqmic so that you can hear everything loud and clear.
cleaned tuned and lipsynced to my video.

Now if you dont like it, dont intend on downloading it , think you can do better , go and do it and keep ya smartass comments to yourself
Dont like the tag? tuff titties 
I am sure some expert will make a watchable print out of it lol :wink:
I know its not paper towns like you all hoped but this will have to do :wink:

got very nice
will do me till retail ( is a personal opinion ) dont agree? wait for better , again no smartass comments needed
enjoy


Video: 720x336 @bitrate 1600 2pass
Audio: English AC3 2.0 HQMic
Sample: yes included
